This class spawns and runs Doxygen in a separate thread, and could serve as an example of how to create plugins for unity that call a command line application and then get the data back into Unity safely DoxyThreadSafeOutput
This class encapsulates the data output by Doxygen so it can be shared with Unity in a thread share way EnableDisableGameObjectCommandEnemyAttackEnemyFinderEnemyHealthEnemyMovementEventEditorInputCommand.ExecExtraInfoCommandBase.ExecutionInfoExtendedScriptableObjectDrawer
